menu.language.title: Zimanî bibijêre
menu.language.text_1: Tu dikarî vegerî û paşê zimanî biguherînî heger bixwazî.
menu.language.text_2: Kar, têbînî û peyam otomatîk tên wergerandin.
applications.title: Just Arrived
cookies.description: By using the justarrived.se website, you agree to the use of cookies by us and third parties to enhance your experience. For more information, or to change your cookie settings.
assignment.assignments.title: Job
user.apply.confirmation: You have applied for the job
page_not_found_error.subtitle: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.
contact.confirmation.title: Spas ji bo peyama te! Em çi qas bikarin dê zûtir bersivê bidin.
user.apply.confirmation.text: We're crossing our fingers for you right now. If the employer makes an offer, you have 18 hours to accept the offer. You'll find the job under My Jobs. This is where you'll also find all communication that happens between you and the employer.
login.forgot_password.confirmation: A password reset message has been sent to you!
login.forgot_password.confirmation.descr: If you follow the link provided in the message you can thereafter set a new password.
contact.description: Pirs yan hizir? Em bi kêfxweşî alîkarîyê dikin!
contact.instruction: Agahdarîyên xwe li jêrê qeyd bike.

contact.form.email.validation: You need to enter your email
contact.form.email.validation.length: Your email must be at least 6 characters long
contact.form.message.validation: You need to enter a message
contact.form.message.validation.length: Your message must be at least 2 characters long
cookies.info.title: Om cookies
cookies.info.description: Vi använder cookies av tekniska skäl, för att underlätta användningen av våra tjänster och för att ge dig som användare relevant information när du besöker vår webbplats. Cookies används även för att mäta trafiken på vår webbplats, för insamling av statistik och för att förbättra våra tjänster. Genom att använda våra tjänster godkänner du att vi använder cookies, såvida du inte har inaktiverat dessa genom att ändra inställningarna för cookies i din webbläsare.
common.error: Oops, something went a bit wrong... But don't worry, we are on it!
login.title: Log in
forgot.password.title: Restore password
forgot.password.submit.error: Unfortunately, a password reset link could not be sent.
start.header.title: Welcome!
start.header.subtitle: Get the experience you need to enter the Swedish labor market
start.header.body: Just Arrived helps you get the credentials you need to enter the Swedish labor market by matching you with Swedish companies. Right now Just Arrived mediates jobs in Stockholm, Gothenburg and Malmö. Create an account to get started!
home_page.new_jobs_slider.title: New jobs
home_page.jobs_applied_for.title: Jobs applied for
home_page.user_jobs_slider.title: My jobs
start.instruction_section.slide_1.title: This is how it works:
start.instruction_section.slide_1.text_1: Li derûdora xwe li karî bigere
start.instruction_section.slide_1.text_3: Di nava du hefteyan de pereyan bistîne
start.instruction_section.slide_2.title: Profîla xwe biafirîne!
start.instruction_section.slide_2.text_2: Co-ordination number or personal ID number
start.partner_section.title: Hevkarên me
start.partner_section.text: Just Arrived is a joint pro-bono initiative designed to help newly arrived immigrants to the Swedish labour market. We are owned by a foundation and is run by an association of companies.
